findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner by setting certain variables to zero or high percentage values.

findings.title: ELFM - Exceed Limit Fees Manipulation
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase over the allowed limit of 25%. The owner may take advantage of it by calling the setBuyDestFee, setSellDestFees, setBuyTaxes and setSelTaxes functions with a high percentage value.

findings.title: ULTW - Unlimited Liquidity to Team Wallet
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to transfer funds without limit to the team wallet, which can be exploited by setting a high value to the _minimumTokensBeforeSwap variable.

findings.title: BC - Blacklisted Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from transactions and may take advantage of it by calling the multipleBotlistAddress function.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.
findings.function: transferFrom, transfer, changeRouterVersion, getCirculatingSupply, setSwapAndLiquifyByLimitOnly, setSwapAndLiquifyEnabled, multipleBotlistAddress, setSellDestFee, setBuyDestFee

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters. There are functions that have no event emitted, so it is difficult to track off-chain changes.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code elimination is necessary to remove unnecessary code and reduce gas consumption.
